availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: A. J. Guthrie (Carroll County, Kentucky, distillery agent)

body.p: Carroll County, Kentucky, distillery agent and assistant assessor of the 4th Judicial District. Kentucky native. Married to D. A. Guthrie. Father of Nannie Guthrie, Thomas Guthrie, James Guthrie, H. Guthrie, and Ivy Guthrie. Distillery agent in Carroll County in 1860. Assistant assessor of the 4th Judicial District of the Commonwealth of Kentucky in 1863.

ab.bibl: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Carroll County, Carrolton District, p. 26. KYR-0001-004-0157.
